verses.name: John 9:10
verses.text: Therefore said they unto him, How were thine eyes opened?

verses.name: John 9:11
verses.text: He answered and said, A man that is called Jesus made clay, and anointed mine eyes, and said unto me, Go to the pool of Siloam, and wash: and I went and washed, and I received sight.

verses.name: John 9:12
verses.text: Then said they unto him, Where is he? He said, I know not.

verses.name: John 9:13
verses.text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind.

verses.name: John 9:14
verses.text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay, and opened his eyes.
